channel.title: Manga on D00k
channel.description: Recent content in Manga on D00k

item.title: Manga read in 2022
item.description: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku - Mikami Saka I read a massive amount of manga in 2022, 55 different manga in total. With a wide range of genres, there’s a bit of everything in here. Over time I plan to update this page with some more about my favourite manga out of this list. Read List 2022 ∘ Kimetsu no Yaiba. ∘ Kimi wa Hougako Insomnia.

item.title: Previously Read Manga
item.description: Slow Motion wo Mou Ichido - Rie Kano A collection of lists, recording manga I’ve read since 2016. Not entirely complete since I’ve forgotten or lost some. 2021 ∘ Horimiya. ∘ Inuyasha. ∘ Shingeki no Kyojin. ∘ Tokyo Revengers. ∘ Enen no Shouboutai. ∘ Toilet Bound Hanako-kun. ∘ Dandadan. ∘ Berserk. ∘ Jujutsu Kaisen. ∘ Dr.Stone. Previous Years ∘ Jojo: Jojolion. ∘ Jojo: Steel Ball Run.

item.title: Favourites
item.description: Kimi wa Hougako Insomnia - Makoto Ojiro A review list, in no particular order, of some of my favourite manga series and recommended reads. Horimiya I reread this almost every year when I can, it’s become something of a comfort read for me, and for good reason! Horimiya’s romance, slice-of-life is both refreshing and entertaining, with strong characters to carry the series. It slows down a lot as it goes on, but plays well in it’s favour.
